EmailTemplate.description: Notification to Opportunity owner and Co-owner when Notes is changed
EmailTemplate.name: Notification to Opportunity owner and Co-owner when Notes is changed
EmailTemplate.subject: Opportunity Notes has been changed
EmailTemplate.textOnly: This is to notify you that the Notes of the Opportunity {!Opportunity.Name} has been changed to {!Opportunity.Opportunity_Notes__c}. Link to the above Opportunity: https://hon-aero.my.salesforce.com/{!Opportunity.Id} Note: This email is automatically generated. Please do not reply to this email.
